titles.title: Recognizing Space Shuttle Commander Eileen Collins, Mission Specialist Wendy Lawrence, and the contributions of all other women who have worked with NASA in preparing for the launch of Space Shuttle Discovery on STS-114.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.

bill.summary:
9/15/2005--Introduced. Recognizes Space Shuttle Commander Eileen Collins, Mission Specialist Wendy Lawrence, and the contributions of all other women who have worked with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) in preparing for the launch of the Space Shuttle Discovery on STS-114.
Celebrates the many achievements of women in NASA and wishes good luck to Commander Collins and the rest of her crew.
